body_html:
thanks for your reply @jart ,

  1. i used visual studio 2015 to run the exampale
  2. i only add main.cc file into a new project as a soruce file
  3. in the Option dialog , fill the head file Directory into the "VC++ Directories->include Directories"
    E:\TensorFlow\tensorflow-master
    E:\TensorFlow\tensorflow-master\tensorflow
    E:\TensorFlow\tensorflow-master\third_party\eigen3
    E:\TensorFlow\tensorflow-master\tensorflow\core\framework

body:
thanks for your reply @jart  ,

1.  i used visual studio 2015 to run the exampale
2.  i only add main.cc file into a new project as a soruce file 
3.   in the Option dialog , fill the head file Directory into the "VC++ Directories->include Directories"
     E:\TensorFlow\tensorflow-master
     E:\TensorFlow\tensorflow-master\tensorflow
     E:\TensorFlow\tensorflow-master\third_party\eigen3
     E:\TensorFlow\tensorflow-master\tensorflow\core\framework
